"Thank you, <%me>!":
"Seeing really is believing isn't it!

"It rained hard, but since I could get a lot of other data,
I'll probably ask you for something again."

"When I do, please give
me some advice!"

"<%me>さん
ありがとうございました！"

"まさに百聞は一見に如かず、ですね！

"大雨はもちろんですが
